name: Stanford Alpaca (52k Instruction Dataset)
summary: A synthetic instruction-following dataset of 52,000 diverse instructions and GPT-generated responses.
notes: Created by prompting OpenAI's text-davinci-003 with 175 human-written seed tasks using Self-Instruct techniques. Covers tasks like writing, transformation, closed QA, and code. Widely used to fine-tune models to follow user instructions. Synthetic nature may introduce subtle biases from the base model.
